svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2021-05-29T17:24:30.258Z" agent="5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_15_7) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/14.1 Safari/605.1.15" version="14.7.0" etag="BNnlA64RRZaZMhVIjViK" type="device"><diagram id="0XEu91Oj15lI6kujoKYv"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 322px; height: 1px; padding-top: 670px; margin-left: 393px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: right; max-height: 80px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Comic Sans MS; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 67px; margin-left: 11px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
版本 Version
0b0100 IPv4
0b0110 IPv6
4 bits

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 67px; margin-left: 91px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 67px; margin-left: 171px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
区分服务 Differentiated Services Field
可用于提高网络的服务质量（QoS）
8

switch.text: 区分服务 Differentiated Services Field...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 67px; margin-left: 331px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
总长度（Total Length）
IP 首部 + 数据的长度之和，Max 65535
将在数据链路层（帧数据 <= MTU）分片传输，每片均有自己的网络层首部（IP 首部）
16

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 127px; margin-left: 11px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
标识 Identification
数据包 ID，同一数据包在数据链路层分片后标识一致
有一个计数器专门管理该标识，每发出一个数据包，ID 自增
16

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 127px; margin-left: 331px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
标志 Flags
1 Reserved Bit: 保留位
2 Don't Fragment: 1/0
3 More Fragments: 1/0
3

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 208px; height: 1px; padding-top: 127px; margin-left: 441px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
片偏移 Fragment Offset
片偏移 * 8 = 字节偏移
每一片的长度一定是 8 的整数倍（详见下）
13

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 638px; height: 1px; padding-top: 247px; margin-left: 11px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #333333; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 58px; height: 1px; padding-top: 217px; margin-left: 650px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: right;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 28px; height: 1px; padding-top: 187px; margin-left: 651px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
固
定
部
分
20
字节

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 187px; margin-left: 11px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
生存时间 Time To Live, TTL
路由器转发前减 1，为 0 时返回错误报告
防止数据遇到环路时在路由器间死循环
8

switch.text: 生存时间 Time To Live, TTL...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 187px; margin-left: 171px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
协议 Protocol
ICMP 1, IP 4, TCP 6, UDP 17, IPv6 41
IGMP 2, EGP 8, IGP 9, ESP 50, OSPF 89
8

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 187px; margin-left: 331px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
首部检验和 Header Checksum
用于检查首部是否有错误
16
